answer_found_by_llm: The attacker gained access to the system using the SSH service.
The operating system of the targeted system is Ubuntu, version 2.6.24-26-server.
The account that was likely compromised is "root".
The number of attackers who gained access to the system is 29.
The number of requests sent to the Apache server is 365.
The proxy used in the system is likely named "proxy," as indicated by authentication attempts and configuration changes.
